sentences: Šerkšnytė was born in Kaunas, Lithuania.
From 1982 to 1994, she studied music at Kaunas J. Naujalio high school and with her aunt, Rymantė Šerkšnytė.
From 1994 to 2000, she studied composition at the Lithuanian Academy of Music with Osvaldas Balakauskas.
1995 – Juozas Gruodis Composers Competition, first prize for the song Misterioso for two flutes and bass
